name: The Explorer's Detour
description:
Controls

A - Walk Left          D - Walk Right          Spacebar - Jump

Right Click - Attack          Tab - Pause

Story

This game is about an arctic explorer which gets lost in an icy dungeon after a terrible fall through some thin ice. The explorer finds himself trapped with nothing but himself and his ice pickaxe, he must fight for his life and a way out. 

As he ventures through the dungeon, the explorer find himself fighting Ice Wizards and Ice Elementals and collecting ancient coins along the way. Will the explorer make a fortune and escape or will he be trapped forever? Only you can decide his fate, play and find out.

Tips

Get to the brown door at the end of the level

Avoid ice wizards, ice elementals and spikes

Don't stand on cracked blocks too long

The campfires heal you

Collect as many coins as you can , there are 30 in total
